name: Store Juggler
description:
Game Info

A bored supermarket cashier decides to pass the time by juggling a big can of food.
Store Juggler is a 2D action game with minor combat elements, meant to emulate juggling an object by attacking.

Players can improve their juggling abilities by purchasing upgrades. Upgrades cost money that is earned from successfully juggling the object.

The game is made with Unity and Corgi Engine.

Credits

Game made by Soh Rui Ming
Character Art - Ho Jia Wei
Environment Art and UI - Mabel Tho
Executive Producer - Isaac Tan
Special Thanks to Leon Lim and Tymon Toh
